sentence.Network_en: Therefore, the objective of public risk management should be minimization, not elimination, of risk - related costs.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此, 公共风险管理的目标应该是尽量减少与风险相关的代价, 而不是彻底消除.

sentence.Network_en: A new dynamic heuristic binary decision diagram ( BDD ) minimization algorithm is proposed.
sentence.Network_cn: 提出了一种新的动态启发式二叉判定图 ( BDD ) 最小化算法.

sentence.Network_en: New optimization method solving minimization of maximum value problems is proposed.
sentence.Network_cn: 提出了解决最大值的最小化问题有效的优化程序算法.
